src: Aste baten buruan, soldata jasotzeko unea zen.
mt: 1 week ago, it was payday.
ref: After a week, it was time to collect her pay.

src: Ginak burua hautsi zuen pentsatzen, baina ez zekien zer esan.
mt: He thought he had hit his head, but didn't know what to say.
ref: Gina racked her brain but could find nothing to say.

src: Azkenik, arazoa zein zen jakin zuen.
mt: Finally, they found out what the problem was.
ref: Finally, he realized the problem.

src: Eskatzailea oso harkorra zen eta nirekin hitz egitea erabaki zuen.
mt: The customer was very friendly and decided to talk to me.
ref: The requester was very responsive and decided to talk to me.

src: Stacyk patata frijituak Kevinekin partekatu zituen.
mt: Stacy shared some french fries with Kevin.
ref: Stacey shared her chips with Kevin.

src: Glenn asko sumindu zen.
mt: Glenn was very happy.
ref: Glen becomes outraged.

src: Zorionez, ongi ordainduta zegoen.
mt: Fortunately, it was insured.
ref: Thankfully the pay was good.

src: Gidatzen genuenean, jateko eta lo egiteko soilik gelditzen ginen.
mt: We stopped only to eat and sleep.
ref: Driving, eating, and sleeping were the only reasons we would stop.

src: Gill Columbo gisa jokatzen hasi zen batzuetan.
mt: He sometimes played the role of Gill Columbo.
ref: Gill started acting like Columbo sometimes.

src: Azken-aurrekoan huts egin zuen.
mt: 2nd last time failed.
ref: He missed his second to last one.

src: Beste gizonak borroka egin zuen, baina ahulegia zen hiltzea ekiditeko.
mt: Another man fought him, but was unable to prevent his death.
ref: The other man struggled but he was too weak to prevent his own demise.

src: Sendagile batek begiratu zuen eta ziztada infektatuta zegoela esan zion Ivani!
mt: A doctor looked at it and said it was infected with a staph infection!
ref: A doctor looked at it and told Ivan the bite was infected!

src: Ikasketetan atzeratu zen.
mt: He was held back in school.
ref: She fell behind in her studies.

src: Baietz esan zuen, eta ongi pasatu zuten.
mt: Yes, and they were well received.
ref: She said yes, and they had a good time.

src: Abesti bat jotzen hasi da.
mt: He's started singing a song.
ref: He starts playing a song.

src: Bagoietan sartu ziren eta gerrikoak lotu zituzten.
mt: They were placed in body bags and tied up.
ref: They stepped in the cars and put on their seatbelts.
